title: Are the Jefferson Airplane and the Jefferson Starship the same band? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The first edition of Jefferson Starship was pretty much a continuation of the old Jefferson Airline, and included most of the key members of Jefferson Airplane. But gradually, Paul Kantner and Marty Balin et al. began to leave. At that point, Jefferson Starship bore no real relation to the Jefferson Airplane, and changed its name to just Starship. Grace Slick still sang with Starship now and then.
